title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 176.1 - Statement of purpose and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 176.1 - Statement of purpose and applicability

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this Part is to establish
the procedures governing the issuance of declaratory rulings by the department
pursuant to State Administrative Procedure Act section 204. (b) Declaratory ruling means a statement
described in State Administrative Procedure Act section 204(1) issued by the
department with respect to: (1)
the
applicability to any person, property, or state of facts of any rule or statute
enforceable by the department; or
(2)
whether any action by the department
requires adoption as a rule pursuant to article 2 of State Administrative

Procedure Act in order to be effective. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
176.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
